pv.name: CTRL-SUP-BOY:AI1
pv.description: AI1 Analog value {1} out of range

guidance.title: AI1 signal reset within alarm limits
guidance.details: Shall be Warnings: 20 - 80 - Alarms : 10 - 90

guidance.title: BI shall be set ON
guidance.details: Switch ON the actuator

guidance.title: Switch ON BO
guidance.details: Switch BO ON

guidance.title: Switch COMPONENT0 in a valid state
guidance.details: The component shall not be closed or in transient states

guidance.title: Switch COMPONENT1 in a valid state
guidance.details: The component shall not be closed or in transient states

guidance.title: Switch COMPONENT2 in a valid state
guidance.details: The component shall not be stopped or in transient states

guidance.title: Switch COMPONENT3 in a valid state
guidance.details: The component shall not be stopped or in transient states

guidance.title: Switch COMPONENT4 in a valid state
guidance.details: The component shall not be closed or in transient states

guidance.title: Switch MBBI in a valid state
guidance.details: Switch MBBI to READY state

guidance.title: RAMP1 signal reset within alarm limits
guidance.details: Warnings: 20 - 80 - Alarms : 10 - 90

guidance.title: Force the interlock
guidance.details: Force the setpoint of the device in presence of conventional control interlock

guidance.title: Force the I/O
guidance.details: Put the I/O in simulation mode - the hardware I/Os measured values are substituted with simulated values

guidance.title: Force the interlock
guidance.details: Force the setpoint of the device in presence of conventional control interlock

guidance.title: Force I/O
guidance.details: Put the I/O in simulation mode - the hardware I/Os measured values are substitued with simulated values

guidance.title: In the event that the MID switch has failed
guidance.details: The tank level has continued to increase and has reached the HIGH level generating a MAJOR alarm

guidance.title: Consequence of deviation
guidance.details: The MID switch fails to operate: defective switch, blocked switch or damaged wiring. As a consequence the pump remaining dormant, the tank will overflow, causing inconvenience and damage to property.

guidance.title: Corrective action
guidance.details: Reset the MID Switch (if needed)

guidance.title: Time for response
guidance.details: The tank will overflow if the pump fails to be forced ON in 10 minutes

display.title: Alarm Page
display.details: /m-TEST/boy/alarmpages/ITER-CTR-SUP-BEAS-HIGH-SWITCH_Alarm.opi "LEVEL=ITER-CTRL-SUP-BEAS-ACK, ALARM_PV=CTRL-SUP-BEAS:HIGH-SWITCH, ALARM_PATH=/CODAC_AlarmHandler/CTRL/CTRL-SUP/CTRL-SUP-BEAS, ALARM_GUIDANCE1_TITLE=In the event that the MID switch has failed, ALARM_GUIDANCE1_DETAILS=The tank level has continued to increase and has reached the HIGH level generating a MAJOR alarm"

automated_action.title: Contact Maintenance Service
automated_action.details: mailto:someone@iter.org,someone_else@iter.org?subject=*MID Switch fails to maintain the tank level&body=*{0} alarm - Tank Switch is {1}

guidance.title: In the event that the MID switch has failed
guidance.details: The tank level has continued to decrease and has reached the LOW level generating a MAJOR alarm

guidance.title: Consequence of deviation
guidance.details: The MID switch fails. The outcome is simple, the pump will drain the tank until it is empty, whereupon it will try to pump air indefinitely and burn out. Unfortunately, every time a MID switch fails for too long, a new pump may have to be installed

guidance.title: Corrective action
guidance.details: Change the MID Switch and check if the pump has already burned out

guidance.title: Time for response
guidance.details: The pump will burn out in 30 minutes

display.title: Alarm Page
display.details: /m-TEST/boy/alarmpages/ITER-CTR-SUP-BEAS-LOW-SWITCH_Alarm.opi "LEVEL=ITER-CTRL-SUP-BEAS-ACK, ALARM_PV=CTRL-SUP-BEAS:LOW-SWITCH, ALARM_PATH=/CODAC_AlarmHandler/CTRL/CTRL-SUP/CTRL-SUP-BEAS, ALARM_GUIDANCE1_TITLE=In the event that the MID switch has failed, ALARM_GUIDANCE1_DETAILS=The tank level has continued to decrease and has reached the LOW level generating a MAJOR alarm"

guidance.title: Temperature problem
